name: Instant Access
tag_list: sap-businessobjects-support, sap-businessobjects-training, sap-businessobjects-help, crystal-reports-training, crystal-reports-help, crystal-reports-support, help-for-business-objects-reports, training-for-business-objects-reports, support-for-business-ob
overview:
Instant Access is a knowledge desk that gives Business Intelligence (BI) users instruction, best practices and support at their point of need.

Designed as an online chat forum, or as over-the-phone instruction and consulting, Instant Access offers a cost-effective, retainer-based service that gives users an unlimited number of interactions with the company’s seasoned BI professionals.

Available for individuals, companies or for a corporation’s own customers, Instant Access provides these key benefits: â€¢ On demand access to experienced BI consultants for critical instruction â€¢ Repetitive on-demand training that shortens the BI learning curve for end-users â€¢ Maximized BI knowledge for end-users, which increases quality of results and improves ROI â€¢ Reduction in time wasted on research, failed attempts and troubleshooting â€¢ Decreased costs and headaches from delayed, inaccurate deliverables â€¢ More time available to create strategic BI infrastructure

Instant Access support various BI platforms including SAP BusinessObjects, among others.
